title: GEA Punctuality Dashboard
description: Mobile-first, WCAG 2.2 AA compliant manager tool that ingests two-week CSV timesheets, calculates weighted punctuality & consistency scores, and surfaces best/worst employees with exportable PDF reports.

pages.name: Landing
pages.purpose: Drag-and-drop CSV upload with header validation, error banner, success toast

pages.name: Processing
pages.purpose: Papa Parse web-worker with determinate progress bar

pages.name: Results
pages.purpose: Hero cards, stacked-bar comparison, sortable table, expandable D3 daily timelines

acceptance_criteria: Displays inline error if headers missing
Results rendered in high-contrast ColorBrewer Set2
PDF contains summary paragraph, hero cards, table
Focus outline 3px GE red, motion-reduced disables animations
